amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit any of the funds being appropriated in this act from going to the World Health Organization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Hageman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
